text: Spanglish is a 2004 American romantic comedy-drama movie written, directed and co-produced by James L. Brooks. It stars Adam Sandler, TÃ©a Leoni and Paz Vega. Sandler plays chef John Clasky; Leoni plays his wife, Deborah. They are a rich white American couple who live in Los Angeles with their daughter, son and Deborah's mother. They employ Flor to be their housekeeper. She and her daughter are working-class illegal immigrants from Mexico who move in with the Claskys. == Related pages == * Spanglish language == References == == Other websites == * Category:2004 comedy-drama movies Category:2004 romantic comedy movies Category:2004 romantic drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:2000s English-language movies Category:Spanish-language movies Category:Movies composed by Hans Zimmer
title: Spanglish (movie)
